overview: Two sisters Ati and Mindhiva; They are part of the Arhuaca tribe, a Colombian indigenous culture. Their dream is to continue with their university studies. They have no money and it is impossible for them to enter in to the National University... Nevertheless they won't give up the fight and theta will search into other forms of education. Will they be able to find the strenght to continue pursuing their dream? We will follow them into their adventure.
title: Ati y Mindiwa
